title: Community Event Planning
summary: Hosting in-person events is a great way to develop and grow your local Python community. If you’ve ever thought about hosting a code sprint, hackathon, (un)conference or workshop, this talk is for you. I’ll present quick overview of what you need to know to get started planning a successful event. Event planning workbook included.
